#summary A description of the Dark Matter Protocol LoginRequest.

<wiki:toc />

= Login Request: Client Perspective =

Strangely enough, the `LoginRequest` allows users to login to an application.

== GWT/DMO Operational Context ==

<font color="#9E0B0F>
*`import org.dmd.dmp.shared.generated.dmo.LoginRequestDMO`*
</font>

Example usage:
{{{
LoginRequestDMO request = new LoginRequestDMO();

request.addrequestID(1);
request.setUserName("joe");
request.setPassword("joesPassword");
}}}

== Full Java Operational Context ==

<font color="#9E0B0F>
*`org.dmd.dmp.server.extended.LoginRequest`*
</font>

Example usage:
{{{
LoginRequest request = new LoginRequest();

request.addrequestID(1);
request.setUserName("joe");
request.setPassword("joesPassword");
}}}

== `LoginRequest` OIF ==
In [DMOOverview#Object_Instance_Format OIF] format:
{{{
LoginRequest
requestID 1
userName  joe
password  joesPassword
}}}
